comment: Это должен по кругу бормотать Безумный бомж1, тусящий где-нибудь в Атриуме недалеко от площади с судилищем.

languages.text: "Будет вспорото чрево теми, кто слышит... Теми, кто потушит голодный огонь..."

traits.locale_text: "Будет вспорото чрево теми, кто слышит... Теми, кто потушит голодный огонь..."

languages.text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.
languages.original_text: "Будет вспорото чрево теми, кто слышит... Теми, кто потушит голодный огонь..."

traits.locale_text: "They who can hear will rip the belly open... They who will quell the hungry fire..."
"They who can hear will rip the belly open... They who will quell the hungry fire..."
"The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.
"The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.
"The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

languages.text: 「『聞く者』によって腹は裂き開かれる…飢える炎を消す者によって」
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

traits.locale_text: 「『聞く者』によって腹は裂き開かれる…飢える炎を消す者によって」

languages.text: “它的腹部将被撕开，被那些听到的人……那些将熄灭它饥饿之火的人。”
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

traits.locale_text: “它的腹部将被撕开，被那些听到的人……那些将熄灭它饥饿之火的人。”

languages.text: « Les entrailles seront répandues par ceux qui entendent... par ceux qui étoufferont le feu insatiable. »
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

traits.locale_text: « Les entrailles seront répandues par ceux qui entendent... par ceux qui étoufferont le feu insatiable.

languages.text: «El vientre quedará desollado por quienes oyen... por quienes extinguirán el fuego voraz».
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

traits.locale_text: «El vientre quedará desollado por quienes oyen... por quienes extinguirán el fuego voraz».

languages.text: "Der Bauch wird von jenen geöffnet, die hören ... Von jenen, die das hungrige Feuer ersticken.
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.

traits.locale_text: "Der Bauch wird von jenen geöffnet, die hören ... Von jenen, die das hungrige Feuer ersticken.

languages.text: "Karın, duyanlarca yarılıp açılacak. Doymayan ateşi söndürecek olanlarca..."
languages.original_text: "The belly will be ripped open by those who hear... By those who will douse the hungering fire.
